spec_data.Name: ppl-devel
spec_data.Description:
The header files, Autoconf macro and minimal documentation for
developing applications using the Parma Polyhedra Library through
its C and C++ interfaces.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sat 05 Aug 2017 05:32:11 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Development tools for the Parma Polyhedra Library C and C++ interfaces
